analysis_steps.description: Starting file structure and organization analysis

consistency_issues: Mixed uppercase and lowercase in filenames
Inconsistent use of underscores and spaces
File extensions don't always match content type
positive_patterns: Some related files follow similar naming (4thQuery_part1.txt through 4thQuery_part6.sql)

recommended_conventions.files: lowercase with underscores, descriptive of content

modularity_assessment.coupling_analysis: High - files appear to be fragmented parts of the same processes
modularity_assessment.cohesion_analysis: Poor - related functionality split across multiple files with unclear boundaries

configuration_management.security_assessment: Risk - possible embedded credentials in SQL and SAS files
recommendations: Extract configuration parameters to dedicated config files
Review files for hardcoded credentials and externalize them

build_and_deployment.deployment_readiness: None - no build or deployment automation visible
build_and_deployment.testing_structure: Missing - no test files or structure

improvement_opportunities.action: Create a standard project structure with src/, sql/, sas/, config/, and docs/ directories
improvement_opportunities.impact: Will bring immediate clarity to project organization and purpose

improvement_opportunities.action: Implement consistent naming conventions for all files
improvement_opportunities.impact: Will improve file identification and relationship understanding

improvement_opportunities.action: Create comprehensive README with project purpose, dependencies, and usage instructions
improvement_opportunities.impact: Essential for onboarding and project understanding

improvement_opportunities.action: Consolidate fragmented files into logical modules
improvement_opportunities.impact: Will improve maintainability and code clarity

improvement_opportunities.action: Implement build/deployment scripts appropriate for SQL/SAS workflow
improvement_opportunities.impact: Will ensure consistent execution and deployment

src/.sas/: SAS code files with consistent naming

ideal_structure_suggestion.docs/: Documentation including process flows and data descriptions
